tool_description:
Get the total stream count for any song on Spotify. Real-time play count, and historical data are available for millions of Spotify tracks.

Contact us for custom plans if you need more requests.
name: Spotify stream count
title: Spotify stream count

api_list.name: Get stream count historical data
api_list.description: Get historical stream count data for the song. There should be maximum one datapoint per day. For each day, the value is the total stream count displayed on that day on Spotify.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com/v1/spotify/tracks/7dsImih2L25fa6qjNphBI7/streams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com/v1/spotify/tracks/{trackid}/streams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get current stream count
api_list.description: Returns the current stream count of a Spotify track.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com/v1/spotify/tracks/7dsImih2L25fa6qjNphBI7/streams/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-stream-count.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
